Brief description: Data are ordered, timestamped, single-valued metrics. All data files contain anomalies, unless otherwise noted.
Creator: Numenta , URL: /wiki/Numenta

Brief description: Each file represents a single experiment and contains a single anomaly. The dataset represents a multivariate time series collected from the sensors installed on the testbed.
Preprocessing: There are two markups for Outlier detection (point anomalies) and Changepoint detection (collective anomalies) problems
Creator: Iurii D. Katser and Vyacheslav O. Kozitsin

Dataset Name: On the Evaluation of Unsupervised Outlier Detection: Measures, Datasets, and an Empirical Study
Brief description: Most data files are adapted from UCI Machine Learning Repository data, some are collected from the literature.
Preprocessing: treated for missing values, numerical attributes only, different percentages of anomalies, labels
Created (updated): 2016 (possibly updated with new datasets and/or results)
Creator: Campos et al.
